description: Yahagi Shougo is enjoying his youth in Tokyo, riding a bike through the streets and trying to impress girls, especially http://anidb.net/ch42606 [Takanaka Yui], whom he meets by a chance thanks to his reckless driving. This carefree time is to end quickly when he comes into a possession of a mysterious hi-tech bike. Shady military figures start to pursue Shougo and soon it turns that the city hides a lot of unimaginable secrets - be it when it comes to the underground areas, the mysterious bike, or the immensely popular idol singer http://anidb.net/ch42602 [Tokimatsuri Eve]. To make matters worse, Shougo`s friends and would-be girlfriend are slowly starting to get involved into the affair.
name: Yahagi Shougo
